song.title: Quel sort merveilleux d'être sauvé
song.second: Sauvé par le sang de l'Agneau
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Oh! Quel bonheur de le connaitre
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Le nom de Jésus est si doux!
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Un nom si doux réjouit mon coeur
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Poussons des cris de joie en accord
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Toi qui dispose
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Quel ami fidéle et tendre
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Jésus est mon divin berger
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Sauveur adorable
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Divin rocher, refuge sûr
song.second: L'abri pour nous dans la tempête
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Mon Jésus, Je t'aime
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Roi de ma vie, reçois l'hommage
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: O Fils de Dieu, quand nous voyons
song.second: La coupe qu'il te fallu boire
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: O l'Agneau de Dieu sanglant
song.second: A la croix pour moi souffrant
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Prés du trone de la grâce et de la paix
song.second: J'ai reçu la promesse d'un Dieu parfait
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Seigneur, ta mort à Golgotha
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Venez au Sauveur qui vous aime
song.second: Venez, Il a brisé vos fers
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Publiez bien haut
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Entends-tu? Jésus t'appelle
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Pourquoi donc attendre mon frére?
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Doucement, tendrement Jésus t'appelle
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Coeurs fatigués et lasses de péché
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Dis, sais-tu que Jésus-Christ seul purifie?
song.second: Es-tu lavé dans le sang de l'Agneau?
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Veux-tu briser du péché le pouvoir?
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Source de grâce, source efficace
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Down at the cross where my Saviour died
song.second: Down where for cleansing from sin I cried
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Pass me not
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: My faith looks up to Thee
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: I hear Thy welcome voice
song.second: That calls me, Lord, to Thee
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Divin rocher, refuge sûr
song.second: L'abri pour nous dans la tempête
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Mon Jésus, Je t'aime
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: All to Jesus I surrender
song.second: All to Him I freely give
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: O Fils de Dieu, quand nous voyons
song.second: La coupe qu'il te fallu boire
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Come, brethren, help me sing His praise
song.second: Oh, praise the name of Jesus
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Prés du trone de la grâce et de la paix
song.second: J'ai reçu la promesse d'un Dieu parfait
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Blessèd assurance
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: O happy day that fixed my choice
song.second: On Thee, my Saviour and my God!
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Oh, what fellowship
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Entends-tu? Jésus t'appelle
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Nearer my God to Thee
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Quel sort merveilleux d'être sauvé
song.second: Sauvé par le sang de l'Agneau
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Oh! Quel bonheur de le connaitre
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Thou, my everlasting portion
song.second: More than friend or life to me
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: I need Thee ev’ry hour
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: When we walk with the Lord
song.second: In the light of His word
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: We have heard the joyful sound
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Quel ami fidéle et tendre
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Far, far away in heathen darkness dwelling
song.second: Millions of souls forever may be lost
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Stand up, stand up for Jesus!
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Divin rocher, refuge sûr
song.second: L'abri pour nous dans la tempête
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Mon Jésus, Je t'aime
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Onward, Christian soldiers
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: O Fils de Dieu, quand nous voyons
song.second: La coupe qu'il te fallu boire
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Thou Christ of burning, cleansing flame
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Prés du trone de la grâce et de la paix
song.second: J'ai reçu la promesse d'un Dieu parfait
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Revive Thy work, O Lord
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: There shall be showers of blessing
song.second: This is the promise of love
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: O come, all ye faithful
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Entends-tu? Jésus t'appelle
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Pourquoi donc attendre mon frére?
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: There’s a land that is fairer than day
song.second: And by faith we can see it afar
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: When the trumpet of the Lord shall sound
song.second: And time shall be no more
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Praise to the Lord, the Almighty
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Seigneur, que n'ai-je mille voix
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: O Lord my God
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: The love of God is greater far
song.second: Than tongue or pen can ever tell
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Great is Thy faithfulness, O God my Father
song.second: There is no shadow of turning with Thee
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: When peace, like a river, attendeth my way
song.second: When sorrows like sea billows roll
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: I know not why God’s wondrous grace
song.second: To me He hath made known
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: A pilgrim was I, and was wandering
song.second: In the cold night of sin I did roam
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: I am so glad that our Father in heaven
song.second: Tells of His love in the Book He has given
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: When all my labours and trials are o’er
song.second: And I am safe on that beautiful shore
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: Abide with me; fast falls the eventide
song.second: The darkness deepens; Lord with me abide
song.author: Gospel Press

song.title: O l'Agneau de Dieu sanglant
song.second: A la croix pour moi souffrant
song.author: Gospel Press
